Description: [bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1385422](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1385422)Acceptance Criteria:*   Change global setting to update every permalink.*   Create a single regex rule to redirect all those URLs to their new dateless equivalents.The date in a URL doesn't do anything for SEO but it does help to ensure uniqueness in the event two posts have the same slug. If we update the global permalink rules to remove the date and someone attempts to create a new post with the same slug as an existing post, WordPress will automatically add a '-2' at the end to force uniqueness.

Title: [Fx] Redirect /products in new locales
